name: Eolia
summary: Drop the controllers and save a desert world with Hands First VR in the follow-up to award-winning Ionia. Eolia, the symphonic fantasy-adventure follow-up in the award-winning Rhythm of the Universe series, reveals a brand-new world of storytelling.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: Eolia Reveal Teaser | Meta Quest 2 | Hand Tracking Adventure
